Articles.Content:
When I erased my KSP folder to download the new update, I was expecting great things.

But instead, all I've got is white flags and missing parts

![bEVuDlL.png](http://i.imgur.com/bEVuDlL.png)

![tIYw9q5.png](http://i.imgur.com/tIYw9q5.png)

Why is this happening to me ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I've tried moving the game folder and I've made sure nothing is set to 'read-only'

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T21:19:11Z" title="04/30/2015 09:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by Ringotuna**
Can you provide more information please Ringotuna? We'll need your logs, where you download KSP from, where you install it.

Downloaded from Steam, it's located in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program

I don't know how to post the log (KSP.log ?) and I will have to do it later because I have to go places.
Verifying the games cache in the Steam launcher should fix this.
Yes it sure did, thank you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
